review_title: An amazing, inclusive charity who cares for their staff like family
pros:
Forward thinking organisation achieving amazing results
Positive, inclusive workplace culture
A creative, progressive charity who embrace change and development
You feel valued
Many opportunities for career development and to gain experience in other areas of the charity
An organisation where you are really making a difference in the world
All employees' opinions and ideas are valued and taken on board
Flexibility
Opportunity to work across a global platform
Animals Asia is a thought leader in animal welfare as well as fundraising
Sense of fulfilment as you make a difference every day
Working with like-minded people
cons:
Must be comfortable working remotely
Naturally, if you are based in the UK, you cannot often physically see the achievements made by the charity in Asia. However, frequent, daily updates are provided through a variety of communication mediums. As a result, you feel included in all developments, achievements and progress made which are celebrated globally

review_title: A dream organisation to work for if you're passionate about animal welfare
job_title: Digital Fundraising Executive in Reading, England
pros:
A 'family' atmosphere with a real buzz about the cause
Flexible working 
No commuting (unless for the occasional meeting)
International experience
Genuinely friendly and kind colleagues
Supportive and understanding colleagues
Fun and challenging 
Fulfilling 
Your input is valued and listened to
You feel close to the rescued bears through updates from the sanctuary teams
You feel close to the programs teams through excellent online communications
Possibility of visiting the sanctuary (I was lucky enough to)
Annual get-togethers 
Possibility of moving roles and progressing within the organisation
cons: If you're not strict with yourself, working remotely can be difficult. It can also be quite isolating. But this can be managed and other Animals Asia employees are supportive and can help you.
